Posts.Content: MamasBoy wrote: My mother,now 51 was diagonosed 2 years ago with Stage 0, HER2+, Grade 3 breast cancer.  Had a Mastectomy and that was the end of it in 2008.She ate her raw fruits / vegatables/juiced, Exercised.  In Aug of 2009, she was diagnosed with Stage 4 Mestastatic breast cancer in lungs, bones and liver.  She received 6 chemo treatments of Taxol, Herceptin and Carboplatium. By December 09, CT scans showed that the cancer was in remission in her body.  Last week, she was dx'd with Brain Mets and currently is in the hospital getting treated. I am just overhwelmed and shocked by the news and want to try every possible option to help my mother.  So If any you ladies have any information, reccomendations or are going through the same ordeal.   It would mean the world to me if you could please let me know.  Thank you for taking the time to read this and good luck with each of your cancer battles.  You women are truly HEROES.  We are located in Boston,MA. Take Care, God Bless Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Stage 4 Metastatic Breast Cancer MamasBoy RobinWendy
